website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this versatile butterfly/bird feeder beautiful, but it has a wide glass bowl for plenty of food to attract your favorite butterflies. Makes a great gift for gardening and nature enthusiasts.
pros: A unique feeder with an artsy design that looks great in any garden
It features a wide, shallow glass bowl for fruit and nectar that can also be used for bird seed for petite birds or for water for them to bathe
Bowl design provides plenty of room for several butterflies to feed
cons: Like any glass item, the dish is breakable
Hanging chain is somewhat flimsy and may need a little reinforcement with a cord or string
Decorative metal butterfly has been known to fall off

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! I ended up getting one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! I ended up getting one for my mom too! I get a lot of compliments on it... It hangs on my front porch... I use it for a bird bath, birds didn't seem to like eating out of it, but they'll bath in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Elegant addition to garden
customer_reviews.text: Pretty addition to my garden. This is glass. But it is so sweet. The colors are wonderful. I'm using it as a water catch since I don't want squirrels jumping on this fragile bird feeder. It really adds class to the flower bed. Even though it is small it's a nice addition. It was packaged well for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll B

customer_reviews.title: Could be made better
customer_reviews.text: Received this today, and not overly enthused for the price paid. The butterfly comes detached with no explanation on how to attach it, and the hanging chain is not only flimsy, but barely soldered on. I'm sure after being exposed to the elements for a short time the tiny circle soldered on to the main piece will not hold up, and will come crashing to the ground; so I'm removing it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the product have most the items missing (charm and butterfly) but the packaging was anything but secure. The dish was shattered and I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly and bird feeder
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made. The bugs/ butterflies and birds are sure to enjoy. I am sure the tree spirit will enjoy its new tree jewelry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bensinger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty looks great and has lasted for 2+ years so far
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what was expected. Broken and would not sit straight. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute and came fast, just wish it was a little cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Mommy's World

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No idea how well this works because it was a gift but it showed up on time undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Thran

customer_reviews.title: This feeder is beautiful. It doesn't hold a ton of seed
customer_reviews.text: This feeder is beautiful. It doesn't hold a ton of seed, but if you're just looking for a pretty feeder, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Birdlady

product_meta.title: Heath Outdoor Products 21524 Butterfly Bliss Bird Feeder or Bath, Blue
product_meta.description: The versatile Butterfly Bliss Bird Feeder in blue can be used as a bird feeder or bird bath. The decorative glass dish will hold various types of bird seed, mealworms, fruit, and more. This bird feeder is a beautiful piece of garden art that will be admired even while the birds are away.
feature_bullets: Functions as a bird feeder, butterfly feeder or bird bath
Glass bowl accommodates all types of bird food
The delicate design is a beautiful addition to any backyard

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
